item.description:
Let's go horseback riding!

Ride #2 at 12:45pm November 3rd

--------------------------------------------

This ride benefits the Carousel Horse Farm's Scholarship fund.

Please help us do some good while having fun!

----------------------------------------------------

No shows are not acceptable for this event. Please RSVP yes only if you will truly be able to attend.

Please plan to arrive 15 minutes early at 12:45pm.

One of our members has graciously given us the opportunity to go horse-back riding again! Let's take advantage of this opportunity! This ride will benefit Carousel Horse Farm's Scholarship fund. The price is a $20 minimum donation towards the scholarship fund + the $1 meetup fee.

For more information about the scholarship fund, please visit the website:

Carousel Horse Farm Scholarship

PLEASE READ!

*Please wear appropriate clothing!
*This includes sneakers or boots (no open toe shoes or sandals please)
*This will be a trail ride at walking pace and is suitable for beginners.
*Horses will be provided. However, if you own your own horse and would like to bring them, you may.

*Please bring a picnic lunch to eat with the group after the ride.

Requirements to Ride Carousel Horse Farm Horses

1. All riders must be six years for beginner ride and 13 for intermediate ride or older.  Younger children can do intermediate if they are currently riding and taking lessons and have been for at least a year.  Trot and canter are at the discretion of the guide.

2. All riders are required to wear helmets.  (bring your own or use one of ours must be SEI certified for horseback riding, no bike helmets)

3. A liability release must be read and signed by all riders or their legal guardians before the ride.  (please arrive ten minutes early to read and sign release and be fitted with a helmet)  or you can request that we e-mail you copies to be read and signed before arriving.

4. All riders must wear long pants and shoes preferably with a heel. No sandals or open toed shoes.

5. All riders must obey and be capable of understanding the guides' instructions throughout the ride.

6. Failure to follow any of these instructions can result in immediate termination of your ride without a refund!!

You may view Carousel Horse Farm's Website at the link below:
http://www.maine-hors...

I look forward to seeing you there!
item.how_to_find_us: You won't be able to miss us!
item.name: Horseback Riding & Lunch at Carousel Horse Farm #2 - 12:45pm
